transcript.text: [Music]
hi and welcome you listening to the
Xfinity report my name is Dave and this
is episode 1200 5b and today's date is
February 15th 2017 and the total the
episode is is there a hidden message in
Michael Flynn's resignation letter let's
get into the economic collapse political
and geopolitical news now we know that
Mike Flynn handed in his letter of
resignation we understand there's a soft
coup going on where they're trying to
chip away at Trump's administration
they're using a lot of propaganda right
now the deep state they want control
back they want Trump to fall in line now
during this period of the whole
controversy with Flynn Nancy Pelosi was
out there and her colleague Elijah
Cummings well they were out there and
they were reading off information from
this Twitter account and they thought it
was Michael Flynn's Twitter account they
didn't know it was fake and the Twitter
the Twitter account read as follows
while I accept full responsibility for
my actions I feel that it is unfair that
I have been made the sole scapegoat for
what happened
now the second tweet in a second wait he
said but if a scapegoat is what's needed
for his for this administration to
continue to take this great nation for
it I am proud to do my duty now Nancy
Pelosi was out there reading this
discussing what a scapegoat is and she
finally found out that these were fake
accounts they were created they were not
Michael Flynn's accounts and she went on
to say that what do you mean these are
fake these aren't his Twitter accounts
this is not what he said and the whole
thing was a joke on her but what we're
seeing here is that the corporate media
is out there and they're using
propaganda right now to finish off the
Trump administration but when we go
underneath all of this we really see
that there's problems
in the White House there are these
leakers that are leaking a lot of
information and House Intelligence
Committee Chairman Devin Nunez said that
those who leaked the contents of former
national security adviser Michael
Flynn's phone calls belong in jail
that's nine leakers that all belong in
jail he said they broke the law and he
went to look to see if there was a
warrant for them to tap the phones from
the FBI and there was no warrant
whatsoever to listen he said to an
American phone call you have to go to
court you have to fill out paperwork and
right now he cannot find any he says it
doesn't exist and what we're seeing
right now is that those individuals they
leaked information from the White House
this is a national security issue and
they violated the rights of this
individual
because they need to get a warrant now
of course throw everyone looking at this
saying well he shouldn't have been
having these phone calls but yes he
shouldn't have been but they obtained
this illegally and I hate to say this
going back in time when we had the
transition teams of all different
presidencies they all did the same thing
they knew they were coming into office
the Electoral College already decided
that yes this is the president
the team's already said okay these are
going to be part of my transition team
start making contacts and we can see
that most of the individuals most of the
presidencies going back in time well
they did the same exact thing but no one
called them out on this but Michael
Flynn he gave in his resignation letter
and I don't think he should have done
this at this point I think they should
have said you know something let's go up
against this because it looks like they
folded too quickly on this and after
examining Flynn's letter to glaring
things stand out first
his strong rebuke of the
liberal media over their
characterization of the events leading
up to his resignation Flynn describes
his calls with Russian ambassador as
standard practice in any transition of
this magnitude even though the liberal
media was incorrectly suggesting such
communications violated the Logan Act
which the FBI and Justice Department
officials insist is wrong so right off
the bat they're saying that yeah this
doesn't hold water second general Flynn
destroys the failed Obama legacy on
foreign policy which has been totally
ignored by the media in his letter Flynn
explains that President Trump has
reoriented American foreign policy in
fundamental ways to restore America's
leadership position in the world
he said the Obama legacy is one of total
failure which Americans rejected and
this is why they voted for Trump and
he's right and one other thing to point
out here is that remember the elite the
central banks they're running the
country they hold all the cards they
hold all the keys they want Trump to
fall in line they want war with Russia
they don't want him making peace with
Russia and they're trying to force him
into a position where he gives that's
what this is all about if he doesn't
give in they're going to get rid of him
now the New York Times is pushing this
quite hard they put out a news article
and the news article says Trump campaign
aides had repeated contacts with Russian
intelligence now of course when you read

unbelievable and this is why Flynn left
and now there's others that are involved
in this but something very important
about all of this is that they didn't
find any evidence of collusion now if
you look at the bottom of their article
close to the bottom it's kind of buried

facts there
no evidence the FBI supports this so
when you look at this you would say well
wait a minute is this article based on
anything no it's not it's not even based
on facts the facts are nothing was found
there's no evidence and the FBI confirms
this an aria Fletcher says well why does
the headline say Trump campaign aides
had reported contacts with Russian
intelligence shouldn't the headline
actually say officials say no evidence
of cooperation between Trump campaign
and Russia but you can see how the
corporate media spins all of this and
they do it on purpose
remember this is propaganda when you see
these type of headlines this is
propaganda I wonder if Google and

most likely not now Russia is out there
and they're saying well they've never

that they're looking at is mr. manna
fort saying listen I do business in

just as the FBI other government

where is your evidence that terrorism is

didn't report on it so the media was not

well that's a provocation and North

because I remember John Kerry out there

because if you noticed John Kerry the

we have every right to defend ourselves
and now we can see that other countries

lepen understands that there was a coup

the United States government central

they don't want Trump making nice-nice
